books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by James Patterson with Candice Fox
books.description: A former Boston police detective who is now an innkeeper must shield a seaside town from a crew of criminals.
books.name: THE INN

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: F.B.I. Agent Drex Easton has a hunch that the conman Weston Graham is also a serial killer.
books.name: OUTFOX

books.author: by Robert Crais
books.description: Elvis Cole and Joe Pike get more than they bargained for when they investigate the abduction of a bank teller.
books.name: A DANGEROUS MAN

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A nanny working in a technology-laden house in Scotland goes to jail when one of the children dies.
books.name: THE TURN OF THE KEY

books.author: by Garth Stein
books.description: An insightful Lab-terrier mix helps his owner, a struggling race car driver.
books.name: THE ART OF RACING IN THE RAIN

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A World War II veteran on parole must find the real killer in a small town or face going back to jail.
books.name: ONE GOOD DEED

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the chief of Israeli intelligence, partners with the crown prince of Saudi Arabia, whose daughter is kidnapped.
books.name: THE NEW GIRL

books.author: by Toni Morrison
books.description: Winner of the 1988 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. A former slave living in Ohio is haunted by events at the Kentucky plantation from which she escaped 18 years ago.
books.name: BELOVED

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: Two boys respond to horrors at a Jim Crow-era reform school in ways that impact them decades later.
books.name: THE NICKEL BOYS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The Levin family undergoes dramatic events with a son in Vietnam, a daughter in protests and dark secrets hiding beneath the surface.
books.name: SUMMER OF '69

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE
